meanings.definition: The process by which cells break down and recycle their own components.
meanings.sent1: Autophagy helps cells clean up and reuse their parts.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study autophagy to understand how cells stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: When the cell's recycling system, autophagy, is on vacation, things get messy!
meanings.sent4: Think of autophagy as the cell's personal cleaning crew, tidying up all day long.
meanings.sent5: The concept of autophagy is like a tiny cell doing its spring cleaning every day.

meanings.definition: The natural, regulated mechanism of the cell that disassembles unnecessary or dysfunctional components.
meanings.sent1: Autophagy is like a cell's quality control, getting rid of the bad stuff.
meanings.sent2: Cells rely on autophagy to keep things running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: If autophagy were a superhero, it would be called 'The Cleaner'!
meanings.sent4: In the world of cells, autophagy is the ultimate decluttering expert.
meanings.sent5: Imagine autophagy as a tiny cell janitor, sweeping away the messes left behind.
